changelogversion.changelogtext: [b][font color=green]Important![/font][/b] Starting from version 1.9.10, only devices with Android OS version 4.1 or newer are supported! Don't worry. This change should only affect a small minority of users.
Fixed a bug which can make TV season scraping failed
Removed some sensitive permissions (e.g. Location, Contacts Access, etc.)
[b][font color=red]Urgent Fix![/font][/b] Stop loading TV show metadata after a certain timeout or after server returns an error to avoid freezing the whole app
[b][font color=red]Important![/font][/b] Fixed a critical bug which causes failures while the app is searching for links
Fixed the bug which causes the app to keep asking for reCaptcha verification
Fixed "No Data" on some older devices
Fixed "New HD Releases" category on some older devices
Improve the bottom notification bar of completing CAPTCHA
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] The app now indicates which link is fast and slow
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added more Fast CDN links!
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] ExoPlayer has been discontinued. Please use YesPlayer instead!
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added support of YesPlayer. Use it now and you will see 70% less video ADs!!
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added new fast video host: LLCDN-Fast
[b][font color=red] FIXED CRITICAL BUGS AND CRASHES IN 1.8.2 [/font][/b]
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Auto switch to an alternate subtitles provider if the default one doesn't work
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added results limit for Alluc (Default: 20)
Fixed and improved built-in video player (ExoPlayer)
Fixed file extension of downloaded videos
Fixed downloading videos not being removed properly
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Auto switch to an alternate subtitles provider if the default one doesn't work
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added results limit for Alluc (Default: 20)
Fixed and improved built-in video player (ExoPlayer)
Fixed file extension of downloaded videos
Fixed downloading videos not being removed properly
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added aspect ration adjustment for built-in video player (ExoPlayer)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added volume adjustment feature in ExoPlayer on Android TV devices
Reduced loading time for TV shows Trending section
Fixed ads not being removed for paid users
Fixed bugs of built-in video player (ExoPlayer)
Fixed Chromecast controller being in landscape orientation
Fixed bugs on Android TV and Fire TV devices
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added a built-in video player (ExoPlayer)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added a button to switch video player on menu
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Alluc now requires an API key to work (you can add one in Settings)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : DiziKing
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] The app now greys out watched links automatically
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Reworked TV shows and movies searching function. You can now search for TV shows and movies at the same time!
Fixed images being missing after syncing with Trakt.tv
Fixed YouTube app keep crashing bug
Disabled DiziBeta TV shows provider temporarily
Simplified menu items (Remove not commonly used Chromecast buttons)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Show posters instead of banners for season images
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Links from Real-Debrid are now in green highlight
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added an option to hide title and year on the poster images
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added a green highlight to indicate watched episodes
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "YouTube" TV shows and movies categories
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Crime" and "Soap" TV shows categories
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added an option to lock Landscape orientation on Android TV
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added Real-Debrid (an unrestricted multihoster) support
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added content ratings in media details page
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added auto sync watch histories to Trakt.tv on startup
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added long click to add movie/episode to favorite
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : DiziBeta
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : Dizist
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : Dizimvar
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : DiziSon
Fixed wrong stream links of movie Split (2017)
Fixed some new and serious bugs in 1.6.5
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added new HD movie releases notification
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "New HD Releases" movies category
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Resolve HD links only" option
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added a blue line to indicate watched movies
Fixed bugs related to Chromecast subtitles
Fixed bugs related to video download
Fixed and re-enabled movies provider : HeyDL
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] [font color=red][Trakt.tv][/font] Movies can be added to watch histories now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Year filter now supports more genre and category lists
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added Chromecast subtitles font customization
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added Western and Kids genres for TV shows
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added CAM version movies filter
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Clear cache" button in Settings
Sort OpenSubtitles subtitles order by download count
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Auto mute loud video ads
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Upload watched episodes to Trakt.tv manually" feature
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Auto check-in into Trakt.tv" feature
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Auto add watched episode to Trakt.tv history" feature
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Auto add favorite to Trakt.tv collection" feature
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Supported long pressing "Enter" on D-Pad to play
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added 4K movies provider : TTV4K, which providers >40 4K movies.
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Auto backup before updating" option
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Landscape mode is now supported in Chromecast control activity
Fixed missing episode information for some TV shows
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added an option to enable/disable and change the frequency of new episode checking
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Show notification where there is a new episode
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : MyWS
Improved the appearance of subtitles when casting with Chromecast
Changed a few Chromecast controller buttons
Don't show the update dialog for multiple times
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added subtitles support for native Chromecast
Fixed some serious bugs in 1.5.3 and 1.5.4
Fixed a serious bug and "Open with..." option not working properly in 1.5.3
Fixed "Open with..." option not working properly
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows provider : MiraDeTodo
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added TV shows (WWE) provider : AllWrestling
Fixed Marvel's TV shows having no links
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Auto mark episodes as watched when next episode button is clicked
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added share app button on home screen
Changed the order of "In Theaters" and "Most Popular" in movie categories
Fixed Trakt sync favorites not working bug
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] [i][font color=green]Beta[/font][/i] Added initial Trakt.tv support (sync favorites)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added options to auto mark episodes as watched
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added movies category : Oscars Winners
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added movies category : Disney Classics
Fixed "Download with subtitles" not working bug
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Swapped "Play" and "Play without subtitles" buttons
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added options to backup and restore favorites
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added an option adjust sources list refresh interval
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added an option to hide poster thumbnails
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Next Episode" button in sources searching screen
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added "Play Trailer" button in Android TV mode
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added back movies provider : Pubfilm
Fixed "Low-end device detected" dialog showing on some devices
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added option to backup and restore settings
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Added option to choose default synopsis language
Fix a new bug which is introduced in 1.4.8
Fix a new bug which is introduced in 1.4.7
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add a new performance related option in the Settings page (for low-end devices)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add "Hide episode thumbnails" option in the Settings page
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add "Show HD links only" option in the Settings page
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add "Show season special" option in the Settings page
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add Android N split screen support
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : MvGee
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Fix ads removal activation on FIre TV
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add ads removal support on FIre TV
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Improve Fire TV and Android TV support
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add VLC Player support (you can choose the default player in the Settings page)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Display movie/episode runtime on details page
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Improve AllCast, LocalCast and ADM support
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add year filter (for genre lists only)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add an option to allow users to enable Android TV mode forcibly
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add Android TV remote control D-Pad support
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] New episode layout in landscape mode
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : PutMV
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows category : Animation
Fix a serious bug introduced in 1.3.10 which causes serious crash
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add back TV shows provider : YabanciDizi
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV leanback launcher banner (Credit : /u/Hungryfarang @ Reddit)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : Dizilab
Remove the compulsory use of a VPN for India users
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Ads removal (aka Premium) now available (Please check our Facebook Page or official website)
Fix a serious bug introduced in 1.3.4
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add play button on menu
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Auto scroll to last watched TV season
Fix FC after play button is clicked
Beautify app logo to follow the guidelines of Material Design (Thanks to rodrigoswz@reddit)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : YabanciDizi
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : MaksiDizi
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : WatchEpisodes
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add back URL resolver : TheVideo
Add back last watched blue highlight indicator
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Allows you to set an episode as watched
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : UploadBan
Fix movie Russian Lolita of XMovies8 and HDMovie14
Fix app crashes while updating using Android N
Change FliXanity, CartoonHD, Putlocker and MoviesHD to FliXanityBased provider
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Indicate file size of all links
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add support of Android N 7.0
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add subtitles service : Subscene (You need to select language(s) in Setting page
Show [Just Once] and [Always] in choosing apps popup
Hide subtitles of trailer in OpenSubtitles
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : XMovies8
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] [i][font color=green]Experimental[/font][/i] Add SeriesGuide extension support
Change movie provider Pubfilm01 to Pubfilm
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Indicate media file size for GoogleVideo
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Filter out media files which file size is too small (smaller than 10MB)
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add option to change app language
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add TV shows provider : TVRush
Fix a serious crash which will happen in low-end devices
Reduce the chance of getting OutOfMemoryError
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes ratings
Change domain of Makedie subtitles service
Don't override MX Player decode mode
Use local JavaScript engine to solve CloudFlare
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add an option to choose default play action
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add copy streamable link play action
Fix Parse Error while installing updates
Fix videos won't start when using any ad-blocking
Add bookmark list button back in homepage
Show notification if source cannot be played or opened by other video players
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add option to choose default category or genre
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add option to filter out non-English TV shows
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add option to filter out dead sources
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add option to choose providers and resolvers to be enabled
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can choose to show 2 columns of list in landscape mode instead of 1
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can play via other video players or using Chromecast
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can download TV shows to SD card
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can choose to hide thumbnails now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can choose to disable parallel sources loading now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can sort TV seasons and episodes in ascending or descending order
Fix failed to download subtitles error
Fix failed to download subtitles error
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add more link resolvers. More links from WatchSeries and Vidics now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add subtitle source : OpenSubtitles (You need to select language(s) in Setting page
Change default subtitles service to SubHD
Fix wrong display name of subtitles services
Increase the efficiency of getting sources
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Now you can choose subtitles download path and shows download path via directory selector
Increase the efficiency of getting sources
Fix no data for some shows
Support 4.0.1 and upper versions of Android now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] You can hide unaired season and episode now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Available to choose custom download path of TV shows now
Fix update unsuccessfully caused by new pemission mechanism on Android 6
Fix crashes caused by new pemission mechanism on Android 6
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] [i][font color=green]Experimental[/font][/i] Add support of Chinese shows name
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] [i][font color=green]Experimental[/font][/i] Add support of searching shows by using Chinese
Fix the wrong video length of MovieTV
Shows sources will be sorted by quality now
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Indicate whether the show was added to favorite or has been watched recently
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] TV shows can be downloaded with subtitles now
Optimize source finding logics. Source finding is much faster now!
